Feature Name: Contact Database can include both member and non-member details
The data that needs to be stored for each contact can be configured
The Contact Database provides multiple levels of hierarchy e.g. Organisation, Division, Contact
The Contact Database can be searched, filtered and segmented in a number of different ways
Via the Contact Database a person\'s complete relationship with the organisation can be viewed e.g. membership(s), event registrations, online store purchases, email communications
Subsets of the Contact Database can be exported for use externally
Membership pricing can be configured including early bird discounts, joining fee, late fee
Pro-rata membership pricing is available for a number of time periods, e.g. daily, quarterly
Memberships can be administered and reported by subsets (e.g. by division or state)
Membership bestows post-nominals on member
Memberships can be processed through a number of different statuses reflecting the organisation\'s administration processes
A range of membership related reports are available
Notes: We require membership reports showing number of members, eg by state and what they grow.

Feature Name: Members can elect to include optional extras to their application e.g. sign up for Special Interest Groups
Individuals can apply for membership
Where appropriate fees can be paid via the website
Corporations can apply for membership and nominate employees to receive membership benefits
A range of membership types are supported
Automated communications to applicant through application workflow are supported -e.g. application acknowledge, application approval
Different memberships require different application forms
Automated communications to member through renewal workflow are supported -e.g. renewal reminder, renewal acknowledgement
Payments for renewals collected online, and invoices generated
Early Bird renewal pricing is available
Early Bird renewal pricing is available
Members can upgrade/downgrade their membership level
Renewals are open for a defined period of time
Members can update there own details at any time
The details that members can update can be configured to be a subset of total contact database information
Non-members (contacts or lapsed members) can also update details
Different levels of memberships can have access to different information/services
Notes: Ideally we want an integrated service where members and contacts can subscribe to specific services (eg. newsletters, magazine) on the one platform.

Feature Name: Website provides access based on interest or settings input by members
Different subsets of members can be targeted based on membership type
Both members can non-members can be targeted
Subsets of database can be chosen based on a range of profile information and/or custom segments
Different communications require differently styled email templates
Statistics are available to allow analysis of success of communication
Notes: Needs to be comparable in capacity to system like MailChimp.

Feature Name: Newsletters (as well as notifications to individuals) can be sent from the system
Notes: Would be nice to have this embedded in tool OR have capacity to synchronise with them (MailChimp).

Feature Name: Members receive directory listings as part of their membership benefits
Members need to pay an additional fee for a listing in the directory
Non-members can pay for listing in the directory
Member directory is accessible to the general public
Details to be included in the directory can be configured
Directory can include a Google Map
Members can manage the details displayed in their directory listing
The member directory can be filtered by a range of custom options
Events can be quicklyand easily published onto the website
Events can be browsed via any number of categories and subcategories e.g. by location, by type of event
Members receive different event pricing to non-members
Events can have early bird pricing
Events can have table pricing as well as individual pricing
Events can have discounted pricing for different size groups
Registrants can purchase tickets to all events in a suite of events or purchse in groups
Registration form required can vary from event to event
The details to be captured for an event can be configured and presented to the end user in a consistent layout
Certain types of events can only be attended by members or by certain types of members
Seating allocation can be done automatically but with manual override as required
Seating plans can be printed
Name tags can be automatically generated for event
Different name tag layouts can be defined
Reminder emails can be sent to registrants prior to event
Followup emails can be sent to both attendees and non-attendees after event
Person\'s attendance at an event can be recorded
A range of online payment gateways are supported
A range of payment methods can be offered
Orders can be processed through a number of different statuses reflecting your processes
Automated communications through order processing workflow are supported -e.g. payment received, payment reminder, etc
A range of standard reporting options are available
Integration with common accounting packages is available
Any number of different CPD goals can be defined to reflect different requirements for different types of members
Categories of activities and units awarded can be defined
Members can be prevented from renewing their membership if CPD goal(s) have not been met
Events in Event Management module can be configured to attract PD points
Where event attendance attracts PD points, points are awarded automatically when attendance is confirmed
Members can track and manage their own CPD record e.g. to add external activities that qualify for CPD recognition
The information that must be entered about each activity can be configured
All site content can be managed by non-technical administrators
Menu structures and Information Architectures (site maps) can managed
Administrators can be limited in the sections of site content that can manage
Version control and archiving of content is available
Content approval workflow is supported
Generated site content is search engine friendly
Resources within the resource library can be publicly available or restricted to members
Metadata to be assigned to resources can be configured
Resources can be assigned to any number of categories or subcategories
The resource library can be browsed by category or search/filtered by metadata
Any number of categories/subcategories of products can be defined
Discount codes and gift vouchers are supported
Details presented about each product can be configured
Different groups of users (e.g. members) can receive different store pricing to other groups (e.g.non-members)
Different shipping methods and pricing can be configured
Automated communications through order processing workflow are supported -e.g. order received, order shipped etc
Differing tax requirements for international orders (e.g. no GST) needs to be accommodated
Multi-currency pricing needs to be accommodated
Upsell/cross-sell mechanisms need to be available
